 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַת‎</span>] **verb** ==be silent== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id***., [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1389</sup>; Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pay attention***, compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; Arabic = also ***be quiet*** (in general), = Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, a differentiated √ ?); — 

**Hiph\`il** ==declar.== ***shew silence: Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְכֵּת‎</span> [[Deut.27.9|Deut 27:9]] ***keep silence*** and listen (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְכַּת‎</span> [[Eccl.13.23|Eccl 13:23]]). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַל‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סלל‎</span>
